author: cnbc.com
title: Elite Data Announces Name Change
text:
DENVER, Feb. 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via OTCPR WIRE--Elite Data Services, Inc. (OTC:DEAC) announces that pursuant to shareholder consent, the Company has changed its name to WOD Retail Solutions, Inc. with the State of Florida and is awaiting final approval from FINRA. WOD Retail Solutions, Inc., headquartered in Denver Colorado is an intelligent retail solutions company that markets sports fitness products to gym owners and coaches. Its solutions include management of retail sales, up front inventory purchases, ongoing inventory management, payments, marketing, and related services.
Contact Information: Contact us: admin@wodrs.com ; 720-240-9378
Source: Elite Data Services, Inc.
